title.narrative: Promoting Sustainable Community-Based Natural Resource Management and Institutional Development

description.narrative: Strengthen legislation, policy, and institutional capacity in decentralized forest management; improve forest management practices in target areas; develop a knowledge platform and support stakeholder capacity building

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
